name: What Lays on Mars
description:
This game was a personal project made by myself that I used to learn about basic features in unity. I learned about movement, rotation and input relations In a project as well as parenting and lightning  settings inside unity, worked with some basic models made by me and some other downloaded sound assets.

It's still under development but I decided to share a quick gameplay of the game with you, hope you all like it! :)) 

If you wanna contact me, you can send a message through my email: agostinhofelipeneto@outlook.com

See you soon with another project!

Lipe
